description:
This is one of the nicest trails in the White Mountains. The views are 360 Deg? Panoramic, you can see all of the Pemi Wilderness, off in to the Presidential Range, across the way to the Kinsmans and the Cannon Balls.     
From the Lafayette campground take the Old Bridal Path to the Greenleaf lodge. Then to the summit of Lafayette.
 Follow the spectacular Franconia Ridge Trail to Mount Little Haystack. Come back down via the 
Falling Water Trail. Trail should not be done in bad weather. It's 14kms in length.
directions:
Take Interstate 93 to the Franconia Notch Parkway exit at the Lafayette Campground. Trail head is just 
near the highway underpass.
title: Lafayettte- Franconia ridge
